duties_responsibilities.duty: Complete all fittings and alterations to the high standards of David’s Bridal.
Exemplify friendly, knowledgeable, and technical expertise to provide superior customer service.
Manage customer flow to deliver a five-star customer experience.
Promote all alteration services and personalization options.
Assist stylists in closing sales by consulting with customers regarding gown fit and customization.
Maintain inventory management and process special orders pick-ups.
Resolve customer service issues in a swift and effective manner.
Maintain alterations room cleanliness and organization.
Perform duties and tasks as assigned by store management.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent degree
1-2 years prior retail experience in an apparel or specialty store environment.
Prior sewing experience required, preferably in bridal and/or special occasion production environment.
Prior experience with computerized POS (Point of Sale) system is a plus.
